-ous
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="ous_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbac16e46.2c9b">-ous</h><pos-g eid="ous_posg_1"> <pos-blk><pos><xhtml:a href="helpp:suff">suffix</xhtml:a></pos></pos-blk></pos-g><res-g eid="ous_resg_1"></res-g></top-g><sn-gs eid="ous_sngs_1"><sn-blk-nolist><sn-g eid="ous_sng_1"><use-blk noblk="y"> (<use><xhtml:a href="d:in">in</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:adjectives">adjectives</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æ„æˆå½¢å®¹è¯</chn></use>) </use-blk><def neh="n" noblk="n"><xhtml:a href="d:having">having</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:the">the</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:nature">nature</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:quality">quality</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:of">of</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>æœ‰â€¦æ€§è´¨çš„</chn></def><x-gs eid="ous_xgs_1"><x-g-blk e_id="13cbac16e46.2ca8" eid="ous_xg_1"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbac16e46.2ca8">â—†</xhtml:a></xsymb><x e_id="13cbac16e46.2ca9" e_inline="y" eid="ous_x_1" status="6" tranid="3"><xhtml:a href="x:poisonous">poisonous</xhtml:a><xhtml:br></xhtml:br><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>æœ‰æ¯’çš„</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk e_id="13cbac16e46.2caa" eid="ous_xg_2"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbac16e46.2caa">â—†</xhtml:a></xsymb><x e_id="13cbac16e46.2cab" e_inline="y" eid="ous_x_2" status="6" tranid="4"><xhtml:a href="x:mountainous">mountainous</xhtml:a><xhtml:br></xhtml:br><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>å¤šå±±çš„</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></sn-g></sn-blk-nolist></sn-gs><unbox type="grammar" Name="modal verbs" eid="modal_unbox_1" e_id="13cbac08c92.-289f"><body eid="modal_body_1" e_id="13cbac08c92.-289e"><title eid="modal_h1_1" e_id="13cbac08c92.-289d" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="19" status="1">modal verbs</titled></title><ul eid="modal_ul_1" class="bullet" e_id="13cbac08c92.-289c"><li eid="modal_li_1" e_id="13cbac08c92.-289b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">The  <eb>modal verbs</eb>  are  <eb>can</eb>,  <eb>could</eb>,  <eb>may</eb>,  <eb>might</eb>,  <eb>must</eb>,  <eb>ought to</eb>,  <eb>shall</eb>,  <eb>should</eb>,  <eb>will</eb>  and  <eb>would</eb>.  <eb>Dare</eb>,  <eb>need</eb>,  <eb>have to</eb>  and  <eb>used to</eb>  also share some of the features of modal verbs.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>canã€couldã€mayã€mightã€mustã€ought toã€shallã€shouldã€will å’Œ would å‡ä¸ºæƒ…æ€åŠ¨è¯ã€‚dareã€needã€have to å’Œ used to äº¦å…·æœ‰æƒ…æ€åŠ¨è¯çš„æŸäº›ç‰¹æ€§ã€‚</chn></und></li><li eid="modal_li_2" e_id="13cbac08c92.-288b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">Modal verbs have only one form. They have no <ei eid="modal_ei_4" e_id="13cbac08c92.-288a">-ing</ei> or <ei eid="modal_ei_5" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2889">-ed</ei> forms and do not add <ei eid="modal_ei_6" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2888">-s</ei> to the 3rd person singular form.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æƒ…æ€åŠ¨è¯åªæœ‰ä¸€ç§å½¢å¼ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰ -ing æˆ– -ed å½¢å¼ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸‰äººç§°å•æ•°ä¹Ÿä¸åŠ  -s</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="modal_xgs_1" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2887"><x-g-blk eid="modal_xg_1"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="modal_x_1" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2885" e_inline="y" tranID="4" status="6">He can speak three languages.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ä»–ä¼šè¯´ä¸‰ç§è¯­è¨€ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="modal_xg_2"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="modal_x_2" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2883" e_inline="y" tranID="6" status="6">She will try and visit tomorrow.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>å¥¹æ˜å¤©å°†è®¾æ³•å»å‚è§‚ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="modal_li_3" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2882" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">Modal verbs are followed by the infinitive of another verb without  <eb>to</eb>. The exceptions are  <eb>ought to</eb>,  <eb>have to</eb>  and  <eb>used to</eb>.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æƒ…æ€åŠ¨è¯åè·Ÿä¸å¸¦ to çš„åŠ¨è¯ä¸å®šå¼ï¼Œä½† ought toã€have to å’Œ used to ä¾‹å¤–</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="modal_xgs_2" e_id="13cbac08c92.-287d"><x-g-blk eid="modal_xg_3"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="modal_x_3" e_id="13cbac08c92.-287b" e_inline="y" tranID="8" status="6">You must find a job.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ä½ å¿…é¡»æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä»½å·¥ä½œã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="modal_xg_4"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="modal_x_4" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2879" e_inline="y" tranID="10" status="6">You ought to stop smoking.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ä½ åº”å½“æˆ’çƒŸã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="modal_xg_5"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="modal_x_5" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2877" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">I used to smoke but I gave up two years ago.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æˆ‘è¿‡å»æŠ½çƒŸï¼Œä½†ä¸¤å¹´å‰å°±æˆ’äº†ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="modal_li_4" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2876" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">Questions are formed without  <eb>do</eb> / <eb>does</eb>  in the present, or  <eb>did</eb>  in the past.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ç–‘é—®å¥ç°åœ¨æ—¶ä¸ç”¨ do/doesï¼Œè¿‡å»æ—¶ä¸ç”¨ did</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="modal_xgs_3" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2872"><x-g-blk eid="modal_xg_6"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="modal_x_6" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2870" e_inline="y" tranID="14" status="6">Can I invite Mary?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æˆ‘å¯ä»¥é‚€è¯·ç›ä¸½å—ï¼Ÿ</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="modal_xg_7"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="modal_x_7" e_id="13cbac08c92.-286e" e_inline="y" tranID="16" status="6">Should I have invited Mary?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æˆ‘æœ¬è¯¥é‚€è¯·ç›ä¸½å—ï¼Ÿ</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="modal_li_5" e_id="13cbac08c92.-286d" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">Negative sentences are formed with  <eb>not</eb>  or the short form  <eb>-n't</eb>  and do not use  <eb>do</eb> / <eb>does</eb>  or  <eb>did</eb>.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>å¦å®šå¥ç”¨ not æˆ–ç®€çº¦å¼ -n'tï¼Œä¸ç”¨ do/does æˆ– didã€‚</chn></und></li></ul><p eid="modal_p_1" e_id="13cbac08c92.-2867" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">You will find more help with how to use modal verbs at the dictionary entries for each verb.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æƒ…æ€åŠ¨è¯çš„ä¸åŒç”¨æ³•å¯å‚è€ƒæœ¬è¯å…¸é‡Œå„æƒ…æ€åŠ¨è¯è¯æ¡ã€‚</chn></und></p></body></unbox><dr-gs eid="ous_drgs_1"><dr-g-blk><dr-g e_id="13cbac16e46.2cad" eid="ous_drg_1"><drtri><xhtml:a eid="ous_sng_2"><use-blk noblk="y"> (<use><xhtml:a href="d:in">in</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:adverbs">adverbs</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æ„æˆå‰¯è¯</chn></use>) </use-blk><x-gs (out) on the streets/street

(out) on the town
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g e_id="13cbac587f0.-7bf1" eid="town_idmg_2"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbac587f0.-7bef" eid="town_idm_2"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbac587f0.-7bef">â—</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbac587f0.-7bef" eid="town_idm_2">(<xhtml:a eid="town_sngs_3"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="town_sng_7" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbac587f0.-7beb" reg="infml"><xhtml:a </>
-ry
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="ry_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbac3647b.2fa1">-ry</h></top-g><sn-gs eid="ry_sngs_1"></sn-gs></h-g>
</>

(slip/be thrown) out of gear

-some
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="some_hg_2"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbac43f7b.e65">-some</h><pos-g eid="some_posg_5"> <pos-blk><pos><xhtml:a href="helpp:suff">suffix</xhtml:a></pos></pos-blk></pos-g></top-g><sn-gs eid="some_sngs_5"><sn-blk shcut="n"><xhtml:ol start="1"><xhtml:li><licontent><sn-g eid="some_sng_12" n=""><use-blk noblk="y"> (<use><xhtml:a href="d:in">in</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:adjectives">adjectives</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æ„æˆå½¢å®¹è¯</chn></use>) </use-blk><def neh="n" noblk="n"><xhtml:a href="d:producing">producing</xhtml:a>; (that's/it's) always the way

(the) Arctic Ocean

(the) truth will out
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g bord="y" e_id="13cbac587f0.-29f1" eid="truth_idmg_6"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbac587f0.-29ef" eid="truth_idm_6"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbac587f0.-29ef">â—</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbac587f0.-29ef" eid="truth_idm_6">(<xhtml:a href="xi:the">the</xhtml:a>) <xhtml:a href="xi:truth">ËŒtruth</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:will">will</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:out">Ëˆout</xhtml:a></idm></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="truth_sngs_7"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="truth_sng_9" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbac587f0.-29eb" reg="saying"><xhtml:a href="helpr:saying">saying</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:used">used</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:say">say</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:that">that</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:people">people</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:will">will</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:find">find</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:out">out</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:the">the</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:true">true</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:facts">facts</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:about">about</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:situation">situation</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:even">even</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:if">if</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:you">you</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:try">try</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:keep">keep</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:them">them</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:secret">secret</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>çœŸç›¸ç»ˆå°†å¤§ç™½äºå¤©ä¸‹ï¼›çº¸åŒ…ä¸ä½ç«ï¼›ç»ˆä¼šæ°´è½çŸ³å‡º</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></idm-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://entry://truth">truth</a></div>

(the) United Arab Emirates (UAE)

-to-be
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g eid="be_idmg_7"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbabaa0af.-36b9" eid="be_idm_7"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbabaa0af.-36b9">â—</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbabaa0af.-36b9" eid="be_idm_7">-<xhtml:a href="xi:to">to</xhtml:a>-<xhtml:a href="xi:be">be</xhtml:a></idm></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="be_sngs_8"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="be_sng_22" n=""><use-blk noblk="y"> (<use><xhtml:a href="d:in">in</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:compounds">compounds</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æ„æˆå¤åˆè¯</chn></use>) </use-blk><def neh="n" noblk="n"><xhtml:a href="d:future">future</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>å°†æ¥</chn></def><x-gs eid="be_xgs_"><x-g-blk e_id="13cbabaa0af.-36b3" eid="be_xg_58"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbabaa0af.-36b3">â—†</xhtml:a></xsymb><x e_id="13cbabaa0af.-36b2" e_inline="y" eid="be_x_58" status="6" tranid="81"><xhtml:a href="x:his">his</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:bride">bride</xhtml:a>-<xhtml:a href="x:to">to</xhtml:a>-<xhtml:a href="x:be">be</xhtml:a><xhtml:br></xhtml:br><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>ä»–çš„æœªå©šå¦»</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk e_id="13cbabaa0af.-36b1" eid="be_xg_59"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbabaa0af.-36b1">â—†</xhtml:a></xsymb><x e_id="13cbabaa0af.-36b0" e_inline="y" eid="be_x_59" status="6" tranid="82"><xhtml:a href="x:mothers">mothers</xhtml:a>-<xhtml:a href="x:to">to</xhtml:a>-<xhtml:a href="x:be">be</xhtml:a> <gl-blk>(= <gl><xhtml:a href="x:pregnant">pregnant</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:women">women</xhtml:a></gl>)</gl-blk> <xhtml:br></xhtml:br><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>å‡†å¦ˆå¦ˆ</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></idm-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://entry://be">be</a></div>

(upon) my word

(you can't) teach an old dog new tricks

encontext="" type="d"></fthzindex>è€å¤§ï¼ˆä¸ï¼‰å¯æ•™ï¼›ï¼ˆæ— æ³•ï¼‰æ”¹å˜äººä»¬é•¿æ—¶é—´å½¢æˆçš„æ€æƒ³ï¼ˆæˆ–åšäº‹æ–¹æ³•ç­‰ï¼‰</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></idm-g><div class="seealso">See also <a </>
(you, etc.) may/might as well be hanged/hung for a sheep as (for) a lamb

Ã  la carte
